meanings.definition: In a manner related to athletics or sports.
meanings.sent1: She ran athletically around the track, showing her speed and stamina.
meanings.sent2: He moved athletically across the basketball court, dribbling the ball skillfully.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled athletically on the ice, trying to impress the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The dancer leaped athletically through the air, as graceful as a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast twisted athletically in mid-air, landing perfectly on the mat.

meanings.sent1: The cheetah sprinted athletically after its prey, moving with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast performed athletically on the balance beam, showcasing her flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved athletically through the obstacle course, surprising everyone with its agility.
meanings.sent4: The ninja moved athletically through the shadows, unseen and swift.
meanings.sent5: The acrobat flipped athletically through the air, landing with precision on the platform.

meanings.definition: Showing skill and ability in sports or physical activities.
meanings.sent1: The athletically gifted student excelled in every sport he tried.
meanings.sent2: She had an athletically built body, toned and strong from years of training.
meanings.sent3: The cat made an athletically impressive leap from the floor to the top of the bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: His athletically honed reflexes allowed him to react quickly to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The team captain was known for his athletically competitive spirit, always pushing his teammates to do their best.
